page.title: 12SHEFFIELD WEDNESDAY
page.content: Match days at Hillsborough are usually Saturday afternoon or Tuesday evenings; though there have been a few Sunday games. The shops are always packed with football supporters. There's always an enormous queue at the newsagents. The supermarkets are better but there are the odd few buying 4-packs of beer. People go to the pub first. Some get drunk and start messing about & arguing with shop-keepers. The pubs near the ground are all boarded up. Was all this a reason why fewer people go to Wednesday matches these days? The reasons given in our survey were:- No interest in football : {15% { }Attend other grounds : {9.5% { }Too expensive : {26.5% { }Poor crowd behaviour : {40% (The events at Bradford % Heysel came just after our survey began.)
